titleStmt.title: Certain select cases resolved. Specially, tending to the right ordering of the heart, that we may comfortably walk with God in our general and particular callings. / By Thomas Shephard, sometimes of Emanuel College in Cambridge; now preacher of Gods word in New-England.
titleStmt.author: Shephard, Thomas, 1605-1649.

titleStmt.title: Certain select cases resolved. Specially, tending to the right ordering of the heart, that we may comfortably walk with God in our general and particular callings. / By Thomas Shephard, sometimes of Emanuel College in Cambridge; now preacher of Gods word in New-England.
titleStmt.author: Shephard, Thomas, 1605-1649.

notesStmt.note: In two parts: the second part, The first principles of the oracles of God, has a separate titlepage (leaf D6) and is also dated 1695. Pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
Certain select cases resolved -- The first principles of the oracles of God.
